basics.name: Mark Tripoli
basics.summary: Engineering Lead and Manager with 9+ years scaling teams and delivering secure, distributed platforms—from early-stage startups to large tech firms. Architected and led development of IL5/IL6 compliant systems and developer platforms, achieving >50% build-time reductions, FedRAMP readiness, and high-user SLA compliance.

work.name: Picogrid
work.summary: Led engineering org and technical vision for Legion as a modular integration layer, enabling interoperability across defense/commercial systems and unlocking classified deployments.
highlights: Created and communicated a unifying technical vision for Legion; credited with >$15M in new contracts, including a $9.3M award.
Scaled engineering org from 4 → 15 across software, solutions, and security engineering.
Established secure SDLC practices aligned with FedRAMP, IL5/IL6, and NIST 800-53/171.
Partnered with BD to translate DoD field requirements into roadmap priorities (e.g., TAK Server-as-a-Service, ATAK plugins).
Built self-service integration framework for rapid onboarding of integrations.
Directed FedRAMP SSP & continuous monitoring compliance workstreams.

work.name: HubSpot
work.summary: Drove the technical vision for HubSpot’s Developer Platform, scaling reliability and developer experience.
highlights: Defined and drove Developer Platform technical vision aligned with company strategy.
Built distributed build & deploy orchestration platform (Java, Vitess, Kafka, SQS, ZooKeeper), reducing build times 50–80%.
Designed proprietary caching mechanism for incremental builds, saving thousands of developer hours annually.
Created JSON schema validation service (S3 + CloudFront) serving 5M+ daily requests.
Mentored engineers; supported multiple promotions and intern conversions.

work.name: HubSpot
work.summary: Delivered observability infrastructure for HubSpot’s Private Applications.
highlights: Built a custom logging system (Java, Kafka, Vitess, HBase) handling 3–6M daily requests at 99.99% SLA.

work.name: Ghillied Up
work.summary: Built a veteran-focused anonymous discussion platform.
highlights: Co-founded platform for veterans and active military to discuss taboo topics safely.
Developed cross-platform mobile app (React Native, Expo) and backend (NestJS) deployed to AWS and app stores.

work.name: Comcast
work.summary: Developed tools to modernize Comcast Test Labs operations.
highlights: Built asset management platform for Test Labs improving datacenter tracking.
Led React Native audit app development, reducing inventory audit time from 1 month to 1–2 days.
